item.title: CVE-2024-44017|2024-10-02T09:26:03.526Z -- minhyeong%20lim -- mh%20board
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in MinHyeong Lim MH Board allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects MH Board: from n/a through 1.3.2.1.
